# Access the admin console

The admin console provides a web-based administrative interface for managing and monitoring your Terraform Enterprise installation. To access the admin console, you must authenticate using a valid API token with elevated privileges for administration tasks.

## Generate an admin API token

To generate a token for the admin console, refer to [Generate a system API token](/terraform/enterprise/deploy/reference/cli#generate-a-system-api-token) in the CLI reference documentation.

## Access the admin console

1. Navigate to the admin console URL:

   ```
   https://<your-tfe-hostname>:<admin_console_port>
   ```

1. When prompted, enter your admin API token to authenticate.

1. After successful authentication, you can access the administrative features.

## Next steps

You can use the admin console to perform the following tasks:

1. [Download product and license usage reports](/terraform/enterprise/deploy/manage/product-report/manual#generate-a-report-from-the-admin-console)
1. [Generate a support bundle](/terraform/enterprise/deploy/troubleshoot/perform-diagnostics#generate-a-support-bundle)

Refer to [admin console](/terraform/enterprise/deploy/configuration/admin-console) for information about the features available.
